text: Tokyo Kingdomーthe City of Darkness writhing with humans and demons alike.
Tsubaki was on her way back from the negotiation with the UFS.

name: Tsubaki
text: (We came to an agreement much faster than I thought. Looks like that zombie gas is a pain in the neck for the UFS as well...)
A formidable virusーknown as "CD Gas." Gaiza had used it to take control of the Dragon Gate's territory...
He had stolen it from the UFS and spread it all over the city. The area had been thrown into chaos immediatelyー
It was such a despicable tactic that even demons would hesitate to rely on it.
However, without such audacity, it would have been impossible for Gaiza and his small force to even attract the attention of people in Tokyo Kingdom.

name: Tsubaki
text: Gaiza... I thought he was just one of the pawns of Normad, but it seems like I underestimated him.
Somewhat lost in thought, Tsubaki continued to make her way through the dark street.
At that momentーseveral shadows suddenly emerged from a nearby alley.

name: Thug 1
text: Hey, princess. You shouldn't walk alone at night, y'know?

name: Thug 2
text: We're gonna be your bodygu～ards♪

name: Thug 3
text: Of course, it ain't gonna be free though, hehe.
Without batting an eye, Tsubaki simply walked past the three thugs as if avoiding garbage left on the street.

name: Thug 1
text: Ahhn～!!!? What the fuck is that attitude!?

name: Thug 3
text: Can't you see?! We're trying to be nice here!!
The three thugs threw a fit at Tsubaki's reaction. Her unexpected attitude seemed to have rubbed them the wrong way.

name: Tsubaki
text: Move. You're in my way.
Of course, Tsubaki was not a woman to be fazed by such a cheap threat. She only gave them a fierce glare and tried to force her way through.

name: Thug 1
text: Ahhhhhhn!!!? You lookin' down on us, you little bitch!?

name: Thug 2
text: Looks like... you're gonna need a lesson in some manners, eh?

name: Thug 3
text: If you want trouble, then we'll give you plenty!
As the thugs flew into a rage, a singular sigh escaped Tsubaki's lips.

name: Tsubaki
text: Wielding my blade for no profit isn't something I usually wish to do...
Several seconds later...
Lying on top of each other, the three thugs were groaning in pain behind Tsubaki.

name: Thug1
text: S-So... strong...

name: Thug2
text: Wh-What the fuck is this bitch...
Tsubaki had sheathed her sword without a word and was about to walk away whenー

name: ？？？
text: Not bad.
A low voice sounded from the darkness behind Tsubaki. Her eyes were as sharp as a knife when she turned to see the owner.

name: Tsubaki
text: Dobashi Gonza. What's this farce?

name: Dobashi Gonza
text: Hahaha, so you noticed, did you? Hey, don't look at me like that. You're ruining your pretty face.

name: Tsubaki
text: Stop playing and answer my question.
Tsubaki had known all along that those pesky thugs were sent by Gonza.

name: Gonza
text: Well, you know how it is. Some people don't like it when a mercenary like you acts so high-and-mighty.

name: Tsubaki
text: I see. So, you're here to kill me then. Is that it?

name: Gonza
text: Who knows? Personally, I think it'd be a crying shame to lose a hottie like you.

name: Tsubaki
text: I told you to stop playing with me. Our contract will be terminated unless you explain yourself right now.
While a menacing bloodlust began swirling around Tsubaki, a flippant grin never left Gonza's face.

name: Gonza
text: Let's see now...

name: Gonza
text: I'll give you my answer if you beat these guys.
As Gonza swung his spear, several Fuma ninja popped out of the ground one after another.

name: Tsubaki
text: An Earth Jutsu... so you were hiding them underground...

name: Gonza
text: Preparation is the key to a successful surprise attack... right?
Realizing that Gonza wasn't looking at Tsubaki but at something behind her, she looked back.
To her surprise, one of the three thugs she had put down just now got up to his feet and joined the encirclement as if nothing had ever happened.

name: Thug 2
text: How was iiit...? Did you enjoy～... my acting?

name: Tsubaki
text: What...?

name: Tsubaki
text: I'm sure I've cut your tendons. You shouldn't even be able to stand...

name: Thug 2
text: Oh, yeah... You cut my legs so～ bad...
Staggering, the thug slowly approached Tsubaki, his legs gushing blood from their wounds.

name: Thug 2
text: Yes... fresh wounds... feel so damn goood! Ahaha!! Ahahahahahahah!!
The thug began to cackle. The madness in his voice sent a chill down Tsubaki's spine and made her reflexively ready her sword.

name: Tsubaki
text: (A zombie...? No... I can feel life energy from him. If anything...)
He had too much energy exuding from his body.
While his pale face was as gaunt as a skull, his body was covered with bulging muscles.
His gaze unfocused, he couldn't remain steady on his feet.
The bizarre sight bewildered even Tsubaki, and with a puzzled look, she questioned Gonza.

name: Tsubaki
text: H-Hey, what is this?

name: Gonza
text: Oh, his name is Enrokkaku. He used to be one of the senior members of Dragon Gate's subordinate organization.

name: Tsubaki
text: He used to be...?

name: Gonza
text: Now he's nothing but a broken junkie. Drugs... pleasure... that's all he can think about.

name: Tsubaki
text: Drugs... So, he's one of those demonic potion addicts...

name: Gonza
text: But you don't wanna underestimate him. As you can see, his body is as strong as a demon's... or maybe stronger.

name: Tsubaki
text: He certainly looks strong... but he can't even walk straight.

name: Gonza
text: Hehe, why don't you fight him and find out for yourself?

name: Enrokkaku
text: Ehehehehe～ If I kill you... they'll give me... something even stronger...
While playing with his gigantic weapons, Enrokkaku slowly, but steadily approached Tsubaki.

name: Tsubaki
text: How vexing...
There seemed to be no other choice but to fight. Enrokkaku and the Fuma ninja pounced on her in unison as Tsubaki's red eyes took on a vivid hue like fresh bloodー
